Context:
George Brown College is situated on the traditional territory of the Mississaugas of the Credit First Nation and other Indigenous peoples. The college asks that the land acknowledgment be delivered before longer welcoming or introductory remarks at events, and most Indigenous groups prefer it to precede the singing or playing of O Canada. For more information about George Brown College's land acknowledgement protocols, visit their Indigenous Education and Services page. The contact details for the college are: 416-415-2000 (regular phone), TTY: 1-877-515-5559 (teletype), ask.george@georgebrown.ca (email). Visit their social media hub for more information.

Note: The text does not contain any specific information related to the programs offered by George Brown College.
